title: Encore: The Enchanted Paintbrush feat. Phillipa Soo
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Phillipa Soo (Hamilton) and Stacy Keach (Man With a Plan) headline this favorite episode from season 3: a tale from China about a kind, humble artist whose paintings come to life.
